caption:
Equation 1 represents the embedding of input captions 
(X) where W e and b e are learnable parameter weight and 
bias respectively. Thez 1 in Equation 2 andz 2 in Equation 
3 are the output of LSTM layers where, h i (h i = f a ) is the 
average pooled feature vector which is passed as a hidden 
state for LST M 1 and for LST M 2 it concatenated with em-
bedding vector. represent the product ofz 1 andz 2 which 
is finally passed to softmax layer.
